title: Grade 9 - Vocabulary: Community, City Life & Wellness

theory.brief: Từ vựng quan trọng về cộng đồng, cuộc sống thành phố và sức khỏe tinh thần

sections.title: Section 1: Community & Occupations
vocabulary: artisan (n) /ˌɑːtɪˈzæn/ - thợ làm nghề thủ công
community helper /kəˈmjuːnəti ˈhelpə/ - người phục vụ cộng đồng
craft village /ˌkrɑːft ˈvɪlɪdʒ/ - làng nghề thủ công
delivery person /dɪˈlɪvəri ˈpɜːsn/ - nhân viên giao hàng
garbage collector (n) /ˈɡɑːbɪdʒ kəlektə/ - nhân viên dọn vệ sinh

sections.title: Section 2: City Life
vocabulary: bustling (adj) /ˈbʌslɪŋ/ - hối hả, nhộn nhịp, náo nhiệt
concrete jungle (n) /ˌkɒŋkriːt ˈdʒʌŋɡl/ - rừng bê tông
downtown (n) /ˌdaʊnˈtaʊn/ - khu trung tâm thành phố
metro (n) /ˈmetrəʊ/ - hệ thống tàu điện ngầm
rush hour (n) /ˈrʌʃ aʊə/ - giờ cao điểm
sky train /skaɪ treɪn/ - tàu điện trên không

sections.title: Section 3: Stress & Achievement
vocabulary: anxiety (n) /æŋˈzaɪəti/ - nỗi lo, mối băn khoăn
deadline (n) /ˈdedlaɪn/ - thời hạn cuối cùng, hạn cuối
minimise (v) /ˈmɪnɪmaɪz/ - giảm đến mức tối thiểu

exercises.question: A(n) _______ is a skilled worker who makes things by hand.
exercises.explanation: An artisan is a craftsperson who makes items by hand
hints: This person creates handicrafts

exercises.question: The _______ arrived quickly to put out the fire. (firefighter)
hints: This person fights fires
Match each English term with its Vietnamese meaning

exercises.question: The _______ fixed the broken wiring in our house.
exercises.explanation: An electrician works with electrical systems
hints: This person works with electricity

exercises.question: We need to call the _______ to remove all this trash. (garbage collector)
hints: This person collects waste

exercises.correctSentence: The craft village is famous for pottery
acceptedAnswers: The craft village is famous for pottery
The craft village is famous for pottery.
hints: Start with 'The'

exercises.question: What does 'handicraft' mean?
hints: It refers to the product, not the person

exercises.question: The _______ brought the package to my door. (delivery person)
hints: This person delivers packages
Match each English word with its Vietnamese translation

exercises.correctSentence: The community helper helps people in need
acceptedAnswers: The community helper helps people in need
The community helper helps people in need.
hints: Start with 'The community helper'

exercises.question: A _______ is a very busy and noisy place with lots of activity.
exercises.explanation: Bustling means full of activity and energy
hints: Think of a place with lots of movement

exercises.question: Traffic gets very _______ during rush hour. (congested)
hints: This word means blocked or jammed
Match each type of public transport with its Vietnamese meaning

exercises.question: What does 'concrete jungle' refer to?
options: rừng bê tông (khu vực có nhiều nhà cao tầng)
exercises.explanation: Concrete jungle describes urban areas with many tall buildings
hints: It's a metaphor for cities with many buildings

exercises.question: Let's take the _______ to the city center. (underground)
hints: Another word for metro or subway

exercises.correctSentence: Traffic is terrible during rush hour
acceptedAnswers: Traffic is terrible during rush hour
Traffic is terrible during rush hour.
hints: Start with 'Traffic'

exercises.question: _______ refers to the central business area of a city.
exercises.explanation: Downtown is the main commercial and business area
hints: It's the center of the city

exercises.question: Singapore is a very _______ city with good facilities. (liveable)
hints: This word means suitable or pleasant to live in
Match each adjective with its Vietnamese meaning
Start with 'We'

exercises.question: To _______ means to successfully complete or achieve something.
exercises.explanation: Accomplish means to finish or achieve successfully
hints: Think of finishing a task successfully

exercises.question: I feel a lot of _______ before exams. (anxiety)
hints: This is a feeling of worry or nervousness
Match each word with its Vietnamese meaning

exercises.question: What does 'stressed out' mean?
exercises.explanation: Stressed out means very anxious or tense
hints: It's a negative feeling related to pressure

exercises.question: Try to _______ distractions when studying. (minimise)
hints: This means to reduce to the smallest amount

exercises.correctSentence: The deadline for the project is tomorrow
acceptedAnswers: The deadline for the project is tomorrow
The deadline for the project is tomorrow.
hints: Start with 'The deadline'

exercises.question: Someone who is _______ expects good things to happen.
exercises.explanation: Optimistic means hopeful and positive about the future
hints: This is a positive attitude

exercises.question: Health should be your top _______. (priority)
hints: This means something that is most important
Match each word with its Vietnamese translation

exercises.correctSentence: Physical health is as important as mental health
acceptedAnswers: Physical health is as important as mental health
Physical health is as important as mental health.
hints: Compare physical and mental health

exercises.question: The _______ is known for its beautiful pottery. (craft village)
hints: A place where artisans make handicrafts

exercises.question: Which phrasal verb means 'to reduce or decrease'?
exercises.explanation: 'Cut down on' means to reduce the amount of something
hints: Think about reducing consumption

exercises.question: The family traditions were _______ from generation to generation. (pass down)
hints: This phrasal verb means to give to the next generation
Match each noun with its Vietnamese meaning

exercises.question: A _______ is the main product or feature that makes a place special.
exercises.explanation: Speciality refers to a special feature or product of a region
hints: Each region has its own special product

exercises.question: We need to _______ these ancient buildings for future generations. (preserve)
hints: This means to protect and maintain

exercises.correctSentence: The suburb is quieter than the city center
acceptedAnswers: The suburb is quieter than the city center
The suburb is quieter than the city center.
hints: Compare suburb and city center

exercises.question: What does 'tourist attraction' mean?
exercises.explanation: Tourist attraction refers to interesting places tourists visit
hints: Places where tourists like to go

exercises.question: I'm trying to _______ with my new classmates. (get on with)
hints: This means to have a good relationship
Match the words with their meanings

exercises.question: We're _______ milk. Can you buy some? (run out of)
hints: This means to have no more of something

exercises.question: A _______ area with many buildings and few green spaces.
exercises.explanation: Concrete jungle metaphorically describes a heavily built urban area
hints: A city with too many buildings

exercises.correctSentence: I like to look around the market
acceptedAnswers: I like to look around the market
I like to look around the market.
hints: Use the phrasal verb 'look around'

exercises.question: The company will _______ a study next month. (carry out)
hints: This means to perform or conduct
Match the compound nouns with their meanings

exercises.question: I think I'm _______ a cold. I feel terrible.
exercises.explanation: 'Come down with' means to become sick with an illness
hints: This phrasal verb is about getting sick

exercises.question: It's easy to _______ in this city using public transport. (get around)
hints: This means to move from place to place

exercises.correctSentence: I hang out with my friends on weekends
acceptedAnswers: I hang out with my friends on weekends
I hang out with my friends on weekends.
hints: Use 'hang out with'

exercises.question: What does 'pricey' mean?
exercises.explanation: Pricey is an informal word meaning expensive
hints: It's an informal word for expensive

exercises.question: The factory _______ waste before releasing it into the river. (process)
hints: This means to treat or handle something
Match the informal/everyday words

exercises.question: An _______ is a task given to students to complete.
exercises.explanation: An assignment is homework or a task for students
hints: Teachers give these to students

exercises.question: You should eat _______ meals with vegetables and protein. (well-balanced)
hints: This means having the right proportions

exercises.correctSentence: The due date is next Friday
acceptedAnswers: The due date is next Friday
The due date is next Friday.
hints: Start with 'The due date'

exercises.question: A _______ is someone who gives advice and guidance.
exercises.explanation: A counsellor provides professional advice and support
hints: This person helps with problems and decisions

exercises.question: Eating too much fast food can be _______. (fattening)
hints: This means causing weight gain
Match the formal words with meanings

exercises.question: _______ health relates to the mind and emotions.
exercises.explanation: Mental health concerns the state of one's mind
hints: Not about the body, but the mind

exercises.question: She felt _______ about her exam results. (optimistic)
hints: Having a positive outlook

exercises.correctSentence: We need to minimise distractions while studying
acceptedAnswers: We need to minimise distractions while studying
We need to minimise distractions while studying.
We need to minimize distractions while studying
We need to minimize distractions while studying.
hints: Start with 'We need to'
